title: Luke Lamperti sees Classics Debut at Kuurne-Brussel-Kuurne to Give Quick-Step a Fresh Bolt
content:
Quick-Step is plotting to reclaim its classics crown with mix of youth and experience: 'We lost a little, but we are still there.'

Read the full article at Luke Lamperti sees Classics Debut at Kuurne-Brussel-Kuurne to Give Quick-Step a Fresh Bolt on Velo.
author: ahood
